data.title: Aces
data.text:
The men and women in the following are aces from both Axis and Allied Air Forces.

Some of these pilots "racked up" impressive scores of enemy aircraft, and made a name for themselves in combat aviation history. These men and women are legends!

(Erich Hartmann - Germany's top scoring ace)

My home state of Wisconsin gave birth to top scoring ace Richard Bong, who was born in Poplar, Wi

(Richard Ira Bong in a P-38G Lockheed Lightning on 6 March 1943)
